segments.text: Please help yourself at your dishes . I hope you ’ ll enjoy what you ’ Ve got .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It suits my taste . You are really a good cook .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to try my special recipe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , let me try . It tastes nice . How did you make it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s as easy as pie . I always follow recipes .
segments.speaker: S1
